docs.text: metro i've seen san francisco in movies many times .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there was 1994's interview with the vampire and most recently the rock .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now , yet again , san francisco is the setting for this movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: eddie murphy stars as inspector scott roper of the sfpd . he is their top hostage negotiator , and the very best at what he does .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when his best friend on the force is killed by joe ( michael wincott , in a terrific performance ) , a psychotic , demented jewel thief , roger makes it his mission to capture the guy before he strikes again .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , roper tries to rekindle a relationship with his british ex-girlfriend veronica , while helping to rear a new up and comer from swat who's an expert sniper and marksman ( michael rappaport ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: despite the obligatory cop movie scenes ( does every cop/new partner movie have to start the same way ? )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: where the sgt .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: assigns roper a partner , roper confronts the sarge , etc . , this film is still one heck of an explosive ride .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a scene involving a cable car has to be seen to be believed , and boasts some amazing car stunts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: eddie murphy shines in this tailor-made role , and for once , his character shows depth and concern .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when confronting joe in prison , you can feel the anger drip from every word .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael rappaport is basically throwaway .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he serves no purpose , except to be buddy to murphy and get disabled in the final reel so that eddie can save the day .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: typical action escapist fare .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael wincott offers the best performance as the crazed killer and jewel thief joe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: never before have i seen such a villian written like this where i could actually believe that he was serious and take him seriously .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: maybe i just thought that this role was different due to wincott's perfectly raspy voice .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i don't know .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what i do know , though , is that although metro is basically a typical action retread , it manages to cover new ground and shed new light on tired old cliches' .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is a triumph , and an entertaining one at that .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it doesn't meander or trail off from its main character .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: an enjoyable two hours , metro is enjoyable , witty , action-packed , and fun , and makes for a great action movie that's perfect for all of us that need an escape from reality .
docs.label: positive
